title: Bug 124777 - Setting a blank tooltip in the chart title causes an exception when previewed
description: When attempting to preview a chart with a blank tooltip in its title, the software throws an exception, resulting in an error. This issue needs to be addressed to ensure a smooth user experience.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, the software throws an exception during the preview process, leading to an error message.
EB: The expected behavior is that setting a blank tooltip in the chart title should not cause any exceptions or errors during the preview. Users should be able to preview the chart without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the chart editor or creation tool.
2. Set a blank tooltip in the chart's title field.
3. Attempt to preview the chart.
4. Observe the exception or error that occurs during the preview.
